```
â†’ Select in Task Templates tab
â†’ Generated alongside standard tasks âœ…
```

### Edit Existing Template

```

â†’ Save

- Existing tasks: Unchanged
```

---

```

â†’ Uncheck "Active" â˜
â†’ Save

Result:
- Not used in auto-generation

```

## ğŸ“ Best Practices

### DO âœ…

**For Project Managers:**
- âœ… **Use auto-generation** by default
- âœ… **Select specific templates** when appropriate
- âœ… **Review generated tasks** after creation
- âœ… **Adjust hours** if needed
- âœ… **Track actuals** vs estimates
- âœ… **Refine templates** quarterly

**For Team Members:**
- âœ… **Follow task steps** in descriptions
- âœ… **Log time accurately** for future estimates
- âœ… **Complete in order** (dependencies matter!)
- âœ… **Provide feedback** on templates

**For Administrators:**
- âœ… **Create industry-specific** templates
- âœ… **Deactivate** instead of delete
- âœ… **Document** template purpose
- âœ… **Train users** on system
- âœ… **Monitor** template usage

---

### DON'T âŒ

- âŒ **Delete templates** (deactivate instead!)
- âŒ **Ignore actual hours** (use to refine templates)
- âŒ **Use same templates** for all project types
- âŒ **Skip template descriptions** (document steps!)
- âŒ **Create too many templates** (start simple)
- âŒ **Forget to adjust** task hours per project

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ Troubleshooting

### No Tasks Generated?

```
âœ… Check: Auto-Generate Tasks enabled?
âœ… Check: Templates active?
âœ… Check: Project not marked as template?
âœ… Fix: Click "Generate Tasks" button manually
```

---

### Wrong Number of Tasks?

```
âœ… Check: Task Templates tab
âœ… If empty: Uses all active (4 tasks)
âœ… If selected: Uses only those
âœ… If some inactive: Only active used
```

---

### Generate Button Not Visible?

```
âœ… Reason 1: Tasks already generated
âœ… Reason 2: Project is template
âœ… Check: "X Generated Tasks" smart button
âœ… If > 0: Already generated
```

---

### Template Changes Not Applied?

```
âœ… Expected behavior!
âœ… Tasks are COPIES, not links
âœ… Changes affect NEW projects only
âœ… Existing tasks: Update manually if needed
```

---

### Can't See Task Templates Menu?

```
âœ… Check: User has Project User role?
âœ… Check: Module installed?
âœ… Fix: Administrator assigns permissions
```

## ğŸ“Š Key Metrics to Track

**Weekly:**
- Projects created with auto-gen
- Manual task additions
- Template usage distribution

**Monthly:**
- Planned vs Actual hours per template
- Most/least used templates
- Template accuracy (variance)

**Quarterly:**
- Template refinement opportunities
- New template needs
- User training effectiveness

## ğŸ’» Technical Notes

### Template â†’ Task Relationship

```
Template (Reusable)
    â†“ copies to
Task (Editable)
    â†“ tracks
Template Link (Readonly)

Important:
- Tasks are COPIES
- Not dynamic links
- Template changes don't affect existing tasks
- This is intentional design!
```

---

### Auto-Generation Trigger

```
Project.create()
â†“
Check: auto_generate_tasks = True?
Check: is_template = False?
â†“ If yes:
_generate_tasks_from_templates()
â†“
For each active template:
    create_task_from_template(project)
â†“
Tasks created with template link âœ…
```

## ğŸ¯ Quick Decision Tree

**Creating a project?**

```
Need standard structure?
â”œâ”€â”€ YES â†’ Keep auto-generate â˜‘ï¸ â†’ 4 tasks created
â””â”€â”€ NO â†’ Uncheck auto-generate â˜ â†’ No tasks

All 4 templates needed?
â”œâ”€â”€ YES â†’ Leave template selection empty â†’ All 4 used
â””â”€â”€ NO â†’ Select specific templates â†’ Only those used

Project from sale order?
â”œâ”€â”€ YES â†’ Use "Create Project" button â†’ Integrated flow
â””â”€â”€ NO â†’ Create manually â†’ Still works great

Custom templates needed?
â”œâ”€â”€ YES â†’ Create first, then use in project
â””â”€â”€ NO â†’ Use 4 standard templates
```
